name: Happy Apple Zucchini Muffins
author: Anonymous
summary: This is a low-fat muffin recipe that kids will eat and parents can feel good about!
ingredients: 1 ¼ cups peeled and chopped apples
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease 12 muffin cups, or line with paper muffin liners
Sift flour, oat bran, baking soda, baking powder, and cinnamon together in a large bowl; set aside
Beat eggs for 1 minute, then beat in yogurt, brown sugar, and vanilla extract
Stir flour mixture into egg mixture until batter is just blended
Fold apples, zucchini, and carrot into batter until evenly distributed
Spoon batter into prepared muffin cups, filling cups about 2/3 full
Bake in preheated oven for 15 minutes and rotate muffin cups 180 degrees
Continue baking until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 10 more minutes
Cool in the pans for 10 minutes before removing to cool completely on a wire rack
